message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper deals with the application of topic modeling to sentence-level tasks, which is a common problem in computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also discusses the use of latent-Dirichlet allocation, which is a popular machine learning technique used in natural language processing (cs.LG). The paper also deals with the problem of document structure, which is a common issue in information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the use of perplexity as an evaluation metric, which is a common technique in machine learning and data science (cs.DS).
